name: SwipeStrike (VineRaio)
description:
SwipeStrike is a Mobile 2D Fighter with Same-Screen Multiplayer and a focus on fighting game fundamentals like Footsies and Combos.
Currently early in it's development, this Prototype tries to define how it's going to play, and once prototyping is done, the main focus is to define an theme, artstyle and feel.

SwipeStrike is Developed by WiseStrike:
VineRaio (Founder): https://twitter.com/VineRaio
Contact Email: vineraio.contact@gmail.com

Made with love!
